content:
/>
VI.iii.2.C.3.b
.
Processing a Debt Waiver Request Originating at the RO
When a debt waiver request originates at the RO, refer the waiver request, along with all related documentation, to DMC by submitting a
Found Waiver
ticket using the
LEAF system
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Debt Disputes and Collection
citation: Part VI, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
